name: GoodMart Groceries
description:
Introduction:

Hi, this is my first ever AR app made for my project for Game Programming 3 called "GoodMart Groceries".  It is a AR app that allows the user to view groceries on image markers, developed by myself for Mobile.

Game Made By: Hamzah (Solo)

Programming by Hamzah

App Design by Hamzah

3D Assets by Unity Asset Store

Responsibilities: 

  • Implement core mechanic features and programming
  • Program UI functions of scroll view UI and buttons
  • Design the game layout with 3D Models
  • Use my own voice for explaining each grocery in AR view
  • Playtest and improve the app
  • Find and fix on any bugs 
  • Implement  app in GitHub Repository
  • Implement sound and animation in AR App

App Description:

Customers are looking for a catalog they can view in real time. In this GoodMart Groceries App, you are able to view the review, see the entire groceries catalog and read the description in AR! Take a screenshot at the top-left corner of the screen!

Controls:

Use your phone and view in-front of the image markers.

Navigate through the User Interface.
